text: George Clooney's kids got in on Matt Damon and Jimmy Kimmel's faux feud on Monday night. After chatting about his new movie ` ` Suburbicon,'' which he directed, Clooney told the ABC night - night host that his twins Ella and Alexander were backstage and offered to bring them out for their television debut. ` ` The babies are here,'' Clooney said. ` ` Would you like to see them?'' But much to viewers'surprise, his ` ` Suburbicon'' star and Kimmel's mortal frenemy walked onto the stage pushing a twin stroller. ` ` He's my Manny,'' Clooney said.
